attributes.action: Enforce upon the football association goal line and offside video technology to stop cheating in Football
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am writing this petition after leeds united were cheated out of a goal in the leeds united vs liverpool game in football. After watching many games of this sort of thing happening to alot of teams i thought this had to be changed.

rejection.details: This is a matter for The Football Association.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
